name: Thundering Penance
description:
When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects:
Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1403], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114032]</color>, it will have the following effects:\nStarting $[K4] +1, $[K104] dealt by the attached character +1.
descriptionreplaced: When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Elemental Infusion</color>, it will have the following effects:\nStarting <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> +1, {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> dealt by the attached character +1.
